name: Sakura Sakura
description: Sakura Sakura is a romantic comedy about two overbearing Sakuras and their light-hearted love triangle. Follow the story of Tohru Inaba as he attempts to navigate the complicated see-saw of love.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98+ Processor: Pentium III 500 MHz or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: On-Board GPU Storage: 7 GB available space
